author: Abraham Lincoln
message: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Courage is not about taking risks unknowingly, but putting your own being in front of challenges that others may not be able to.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
title: Thought of the day

author: Harry Kemp
message: The poor man is not he who is without a cent, but he who is without a dream.
title: Thought of the day
